function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misinformation and lack of education on contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding masks and medical supplies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate support for schools, businesses, and furloughed workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of border control and case identification leading to unmonitored spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources leading to inadequate supply of essential medical equipment like masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation leading to public anxiety and confusion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proactive case finding and retesting for covid 19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overloading of the hotline system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease stigma and compassion for affected individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity to mainland china and high number of flights increase the risk of covid-19 transmission to taiwan.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constant alert and readiness to act on epidemics arising from china since the 2003 sars epidemic.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health declaration border pass and mobile phone tracking for immigration clearance and quarantine enforcement.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High requirement of technical personnel and high costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residual disinfectants after disinfection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of qualified personnel for waste management and disposal","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine disinfection in hospital wastewater may result in chlorine-resistant pathogens.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper handling of infectious waste may lead to the spread of the sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes may lead to the persistence of infectious materials.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged survival of sars viruses in hospital wastewater and waste","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variable efficiency of ozone disinfection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through contaminated hospital waste and wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate studies on the inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper disposal of pharmaceutical wastes at sanitary handling and disposal of radioactive wastes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious wastes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of disposable medical supplies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal of pharmaceutical wastes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High temperature incineration may generate hazardous substances like dioxins during low temperature combustion","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixing non-hazardous wastes with hazardous or infectious pollutants may require special disposal and disinfection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different disinfection and disposal methods should be adopted based on unique characteristics of different hospital wastes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new disinfection technologies may lead to improper implementation and potential errors in operation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential environmental pollution and health risks due to improper disposal of biohazardous wastes and toxic residues after disinfection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious microorganisms surviving plasma incineration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor treatment of hospital wastes with risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete combustion due to excess air demand","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High investment costs for small and medium scale equipment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complicated maintenance and high maintenance costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
